i1.blurb: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Basic attacks deal {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% armor)}} {{tip|magic damage|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by 50% to {{as|15 {{as|(+ 15% armor)}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} while {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} is active.
i1.name: Spiked Shell

q1.blurb: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' tucks into a ball and begins to roll, {{ct|channel|channeling|attack=false|move=true|cast=Q and W interrupt. E is disabled. R is usable|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}} for up to 6 seconds, gaining {{pp|key=%|150/6 to 235/6|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} per second over the duration, up to a maximum of {{pp|key=%|150 to 235|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

'''Rammus''' stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all nearby enemies 100 units over {{tt|{{fd|0.75}} seconds|Estimated}}, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
q1.name: Powerball
notes: * ''Powerball'' will still hit nearby enemies (including minions) if ''Rammus'' is {{tip|ghosted}}.
* ''Powerball'' will trigger {{nie|Mana Charge}} twice (upon activation and when ending it prematurely).

w1.blurb: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' drops into a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, increasing {{ais|Spiked Shell|Rammus}} damage by 50%, and applying it to enemies whenever they use basic attacks against him. '''Rammus''' is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for the duration.
''Defensive Ball Curl'' can be canceled instantly by reactivating the ability or by activating {{ai|Powerball|Rammus}}.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Armor|30 {{as|(+ {{ap|60 to 100}}% '''total''' armor)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Resistance|10 {{as|(+ {{ap|30 to 50}}% '''total''' magic resistance)}}}}
w1.name: Defensive Ball Curl
notes: * ''Defensive Ball Curl'' will return damage from attacks and/or abilities that apply [[on-hit effect]]s ({{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}) as well as from {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} (will not return damage from [[turret]]s, {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger}}, or {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}).

e1.blurb: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' {{tip|taunt|taunts}} the target enemy, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for the duration.
While {{ai|Powerball|Rammus}}, {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} or {{ai|Tremors|Rammus}} is active, the {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} is refreshed.
e1.name: Frenzying Taunt
notes: * ''Frenzying Taunt'' behaves like a {{tip|stun}} when cast right before ''Rammus'' enters {{tip|stasis}}.

r1.blurb: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' creates an earthquake around himself for 8 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to nearby enemies for the duration. Structures receive double damage.
The {{tip|slow}} persists for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and stacks up to 8 times.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|30 to 90}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30*8 to 90*8}} {{as|(+ 160% AP)}}}}
{{st|Structure Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|30*2 to 90*2}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Structure Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30*2*8 to 90*2*8}} {{as|(+ 320% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Tremors
notes: * ''Tremors'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rammus' ''previous orders.
